original_text: And delivered him out of all his afflictions, and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house.
korean_text: 그 모든 환난에서 건져내사 애굽 왕 바로 앞에서 은총과 지혜를 주시매 바로가 그를 애굽과 자기 온 집의 통치자로 세웠느니라

sentences.original_text: And delivered him out of all his afflictions
and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 애굽 왕 바로 앞에서 지혜를 주셨으니

sentences.original_text: and he made him governor over Egypt
